nodes.text: Angela Krin was a female Human Lieutenant Commander who served in the Corporate Sector Authority's fleet.

Krin was the commander of the Resolute, an Invincible-class Dreadnaught which enforced the quarantine of Endregaad, in the Tion Cluster. Shortly thereafter she received a promotion to Captain. She later played a major role in confounding the schemes of Mika Anjiliac Chiera.
